name: American Chamber of Commerce Ireland
goal:
The American Chamber of Commerce Ireland is the leading international business organisation in Ireland. Membership includes the top US companies in Ireland, the Irish
companies that support them, and the growing number of Irish companies with business in the US. Our advocacy work focuses on the strength and depth of the 3-way Transatlantic trade and economic relationship that benefits the US, the EU and Ireland
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Innovation 2020
Cyber and data policies
Infrastructure
Brexit
External Trade
Transatlantic relations
